( #{detail.orderId}, #{detail.spuId}, #{detail.skuId}, #{detail.count}, #{detail.discountType}, #{detail.originAmount}, #{detail.amount}, #{detail.discountAmount} )
mapper.select: SELECT m.*, d.count AS refundCount, d.amount AS refundAmount FROM ( SELECT a.order_id, p.spu_name, a.sku_id, a.count, a.discount_type, a.origin_amount, a.amount, a.discount_amount FROM order_detail a, spu p WHERE a.spu_id = p.spu_id AND a.order_id = #{orderId} ) m LEFT JOIN ( SELECT sku_id,sum( count ) AS count, sum( amount ) AS amount FROM refund WHERE order_id = #{orderId} GROUP BY sku_id ) d ON m.sku_id = d.sku_id
